This guide is a simplified overview of all changes in the [[Adventure Update]] ({{JE}} Beta 1.8.''x'' and 1.0.''x'' releases), which assumes at least some familiarity with ''Java Edition'' Beta 1.7.''x'' releases.

Since Adventure Update was released in 2 separate updates with various changes in between, the guide is split in 2 parts, one for each major update release.

* [[Java Edition guides/Adventure Update: Part I]] - Beta 1.8.''x'' releases
* [[Java Edition guides/Adventure Update: Part II]] - 1.0.''x'' releases
